,sum(totalCount) as totalTestCount ,sum(fair) as totalFairQualityCount ,sum(fault) as totalFaultCount from ( select DATENAME(YYYY, dateTime) +'년 '+ DATENAME(MM, datetime) +'월 ' + case when len(datename(dd, datetime)) = 1 then '0' else '' end + DATENAME(DD, datetime) + '일' AS selectDay ,DATENAME(yyyy, dateTime)+ '년 ' + DATENAME(ww, dateTime) + '주' AS selectWeek ,DATENAME(yyyy, dateTime)+ '년 ' + DATENAME(MM, dateTime) + '월' AS selectMonth ,DATENAME(yyyy, dateTime)+ '년 ' AS selectYear ,fairQualityCount as fair ,faultCount as fault ,fairQualityCount + faultCount as totalCount from OG_TestReport where 1=1
and dateTime >= #{fromDate}
and dateTime <= #{toDate}
) baseTbl
group by selectDay order by selectDay desc
group by selectWeek order by selectWeek desc
group by selectMonth order by selectMonth desc
group by selectYear order by selectYear desc
